Bournemouth, Dorset WISE 19thC-20thC Wroxton OXF Anne Williams Kenneth Robert WISE b. 23 Oct 1917 Wroxton Oxon, son of Sydney and Margaret. Possibly shipworker.

Between 1943-44 sailed on "Cefn-y-Brynt"o. Believe he died in South Africa anne-mc (@) live.co.uk

Adderbury OXF WISE 20thC Wroxton OXF to Canada and USA Anne Williams Joseph WISE was born 1903 s. Sydney and Margaret WISE in Wroxton. The family moved to London after two of their sons had been killed in the first world war (see above). In 1923 his mother paid Â£5 passage to Canada to work as a harvester. In 1931 he crossed the boarder to USAÂ with a wife Ruth. Any information, however small, would be very much appreciated anne-mc (@) live.co.uk
